record.field: You did great at your job.
No one can solve challenges like you do.
You have found the hidden badge
With your brilliant ideas, you are an inspiration to others.

Congratulation, you have received the badge ${object.badge_id.name} ! % if object.user_from_id This badge was granted by ${object.user_from_id.name}. % endif

% if object.comment

${object.comment}

% endif
